title: Titles Condensed Sans
content:

comments.content: Trade Gothic LT Std (Bold) from Adobe

thanks Bojev! good info indeed. Solved!

by the way, while posting i have the "who solved the post" box, but when i am replying i don't see it anymore. Where is it do you know? i want to say the post if solved now. Thanks

Cheers,
